Title: "Indexer Field Mapping and Execution in Azure Search"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfIf field names and types are the same at bothends, no mapping is required."outputFieldMappings" are for fields created by skills, after skillset execution. Thereferences to sourceFieldName in outputFieldMappings don't exist until documentcracking or enrichment creates them. The targetFieldName is a field in an index,defined in the index schema.
